comments:
Created 1894 from the part of the parish of Mynyddislwyn in Abercarn 
    Urban District. See also Table 2, note (c).

That part which until 1.4.1935 formed part of the parish of Mynyddislwyn. 
    See also Table 2, note (c).

Abolished 1.4.1935 and divided between the parishes of Caerleon 
    and Llanhennock Fawr.

Abolished 1.4.1935 and divided between the parishes of Llanhennock 
    Fawr, Kemeys Inferior and Caerleon.

Created 1.4.1935 out of the parishes of Llanhennock, Llangattock 
    juxta Caerleon and Tredunnock. See also Table 2, note (c).

Abolished 1.4.1935 and divided between the parishes of Newport 
    and Bettws.
Abolished 1.4.1935 and added to the parish of Newport.

Abolished 1.4.1935 and added to the parish of Llanhennock 
    Fawr.
